item.description:
Join Buffett and me to explore or revisit trails throughout the forest.  Hikes will be 2-3 hours unless otherwise noted.  Hiking shoes or boots, weather appropriate layers, water, and snacks are recommended.  Dogs are welcome but not required.

Suggestions for future routes are welcome.

Meeting places will vary from week to week.  Please check times and locations on the morning of the hike in case of last minute changes or cancellation.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: A Walk in the Park
